Question.Subject: help im getting addicted to computers and television how do i stop?
Question.Content: i need help im always getting adictiedto compuers and television what can i do to stop plz help
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Well, I'm the same way when it comes to computers. TV? Not so much. I've embraced that I just love computers. Working with computers, programming computers, basically (almost) anything and everything computer-related, I love.
If you are still wanting to change your habits. Just find something else to occupy your time. Play games, go outside, talk to friends, etc. Eventually you'll find that you aren't spending near as much time on your computer as you were.

Answer.Content: get rid of your tv>i did that 10 years ago

Well, I'm the same way when it comes to computers. TV? Not so much. I've embraced that I just love computers. Working with computers, programming computers, basically (almost) anything and everything computer-related, I love.
If you are still wanting to change your habits. Just find something else to occupy your time. Play games, go outside, talk to friends, etc. Eventually you'll find that you aren't spending near as much time on your computer as you were.
Answer.Reference: I'm an introvert, so I love computers. (Their something to do when alone) But I've been in the same situation.
